Name: Alexander the Great: Secrets of Power
About the game: Unlock the secret of power of Alexander the Great, collect all the artifacts and save the world in this amazing hidden object adventure full of mysteries! Long ago, a renowned warrior and ruler, Alexander the Great, endued his crown, dagger and ring with magical powers. The power once bestowed on each artifact is strong, and capable of causing irreparable harm, should they fall into the hands of the evil. Now it's up to you, a descendant of the ancient emperor, to collect all the artifacts and save the world. Dive into the whirlpool of dramatic events and thrilling mysteries to unlock the secrets of ancient power! Game features: - Discover 30 unique locations - Enjoy over 45 mini-games - Dive into the fascinating storyline - Unlock the secret of power of Alexander the Great
